GSD.description:
ext4: fix warning in 'ext4_da_release_space'

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 0a43c015e98121c91a76154edf42280ce1a8a883. For more details please see the references link.
